name: Jack Frost, Destroyer
description:
Jack Frost just wants to make the whole world chill out a little. That's why he's made it his duty to bring winter everywhere in the country! Nothing can stop him - well, except for the neighborhood children.

As Jack, your goal is to spread snow throughout as much of the map as possible. But, since you're a snowman, you need to make sure you don't run out of snow.

This is a 10-15 minute game made for the Totally Ranked Holiday Jam.
